name: Sky Sanctuary
description: Take a stroll in a peaceful VR sanctuary high in the clouds. Empty your mind, focus and unleash your combat skills. With your robot companion, explore the archipelago to reveal its secrets and become a true samurai.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
